tags.name: el-affix
tags.description: Fix the element to a specific visible area.

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when fixed state changed

events.name: scroll
events.description: triggers when scrolling

tags.name: el-alert
tags.description: Displays important alert messages.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Descriptive text. Can also be passed with the default slot

attributes.name: show-icon
attributes.description: If a type icon is displayed

events.name: close
events.description: fires when alert is closed

tags.name: el-avatar
tags.description: Avatars can be used to represent people or objects. It supports images, Icons, or characters.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: set representation type to Icon, more info on Icon Component

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: the address of the image for an image avatar

attributes.name: src-set
attributes.description: A list of one or more strings separated by commas indicating a set of possible image sources for the user agent to use

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: This attribute defines an alternative text description of the image

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: set how the image fit its container for an image avatar

events.name: error
events.description: handler when img load error, return false to prevent default fallback behavior

tags.name: el-backtop
tags.description: A button to back to top

attributes.name: visibility-height
attributes.description: the button will not show until the scroll height reaches this value

events.name: click
events.description: triggers when click

tags.name: el-badge
tags.description: A number or status mark on buttons and icons.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: maximum value, shows '{max}+' when exceeded. Only works if `value` is a `Number`

attributes.name: is-dot
attributes.description: if a little dot is displayed

tags.name: el-breadcrumb
tags.description: Displays the location of the current page, making it easier to browser back.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: target route of the link, same as `to` of `vue-router`

attributes.name: replace
attributes.description: if `true`, the navigation will not leave a history record

tags.name: el-button
tags.description: Commonly used button.

attributes.name: plain
attributes.description: determine whether it's a plain button

attributes.name: round
attributes.description: determine whether it's a round button

attributes.name: circle
attributes.description: determine whether it's a circle button

tags.name: el-calendar
tags.description: Display date.

attributes.name: range
attributes.description: time range, including start time and end time. Start time must be start day of week, end time must be end day of week, the time span cannot exceed two months.

tags.name: el-card
tags.description: Integrate information in a card container.

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: title of the card. Also accepts a DOM passed by `slot#header`

tags.name: el-carousel
tags.description: Loop a series of images or texts in a limited space

attributes.name: initial-index
attributes.description: index of the initially active slide (starting from 0)

attributes.name: interval
attributes.description: interval of the auto loop, in milliseconds

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the active slide switches

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: name of the item, can be used in `setActiveItem`

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: text content for the corresponding indicator

tags.name: el-cascader
tags.description: If the options have a clear hierarchical structure, Cascader can be used to view and select them.

attributes.name: options
attributes.description: data of the options，the key of `value` and `label` can be customize by `Props`.

attributes.name: props
attributes.description: configuration options, see the following table.

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.description: whether selected value can be cleared

attributes.name: show-all-levels
attributes.description: whether to display all levels of the selected value in the input

attributes.name: collapse-tags
attributes.description: whether to collapse tags in multiple selection mode

attributes.name: filterable
attributes.description: whether the options can be searched

attributes.name: filter-method
attributes.description: customize search logic, the first parameter is `node`, the second is `keyword`, and need return a boolean value indicating whether it hits.

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: debounce delay when typing filter keyword, in milliseconds

attributes.name: before-filter
attributes.description: hook function before filtering with the value to be filtered as its parameter. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, filtering will be aborted

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for Cascader's dropdown

attributes.name: popper-append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append the popper menu to body. If the positioning of the popper is wrong, you can try to set this prop to false

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the binding value changes

events.name: expand-change
events.description: triggers when expand option changes

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Cascader blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Cascader focuses

events.name: visible-change
events.description: triggers when the dropdown appears/disappears

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: triggers when remove tag in multiple selection mode

slots.name: default
slots.description: the custom content of cascader node, the parameter is { node, data }, which are current Node object and node data respectively.

slots.name: empty
slots.description: content when there is no matched options.

attributes.name: options
attributes.description: data of the options，the key of `value` and `label` can be customize by `Props`.

attributes.name: props
attributes.description: configuration options, see the following table.

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the binding value changes

events.name: expand-change
events.description: triggers when expand option changes

slots.name: default
slots.description: the custom content of cascader node, the parameter is { node, data }, which are current Node object and node data respectively.

tags.name: el-checkbox
tags.description: A group of options for multiple choices.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: value of the Checkbox when used inside a `checkbox-group`

attributes.name: true-label
attributes.description: value of the Checkbox if it's checked

attributes.name: false-label
attributes.description: value of the Checkbox if it's not checked

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: whether to add a border around Checkbox

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: size of the Checkbox, only works when `border` is true

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the binding value changes

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: size of checkbox buttons or bordered checkboxes

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: whether the nesting checkboxes are disabled

attributes.name: text-color
attributes.description: font color when button is active

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: border and background color when button is active

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the binding value changes

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: value of the checkbox when used inside a `checkbox-group`

attributes.name: true-label
attributes.description: value of the checkbox if it's checked

attributes.name: false-label
attributes.description: value of the checkbox if it's not checked

tags.name: el-collapse
tags.description: Use Collapse to store contents.

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when active panels change

tags.name: el-color-picker
tags.description: ColorPicker is a color selector supporting multiple color formats.

attributes.name: show-alpha
attributes.description: whether to display the alpha slider

attributes.name: color-format
attributes.default: hex (when show-alpha is false)/ rgb (when show-alpha is true)

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for ColorPicker's dropdown

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when input value changes

events.name: active-change
events.description: triggers when the current active color changes

attributes.name: i18n
attributes.description: External translator, when this attribute is provided, it will be used at first, and it will fallback to default translator when this method returns nullish value

tags.name: el-container
tags.description: Container components for scaffolding basic structure of the page:

attributes.name: direction
attributes.default: vertical when nested with `el-header` or `el-footer`; horizontal otherwise

tags.name: el-date-picker
tags.description: Use Date Picker for date input.

attributes.name: start-placeholder
attributes.description: placeholder for the start date in range mode

attributes.name: end-placeholder
attributes.description: placeholder for the end date in range mode

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: format of the displayed value in the input box

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for DatePicker's dropdown

attributes.name: default-value
attributes.description: optional, default date of the calendar

attributes.name: default-time
attributes.description: optional, the time value to use when selecting date range

attributes.name: value-format
attributes.description: optional, format of binding value. If not specified, the binding value will be a Date object

attributes.name: disabled-date
attributes.description: a function determining if a date is disabled with that date as its parameter. Should return a Boolean

attributes.name: shortcuts
attributes.description: an object array to set shortcut options

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when user confirms the value

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

events.name: calendar-change
events.description: triggers when the calendar selected date is changed. Only for `daterange`

tags.name: el-descriptions
tags.description: Display multiple fields in list form.

attributes.name: column
attributes.description: numbers of `Descriptions Item` in one line

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: title text, display on the top left

attributes.name: extra
attributes.description: extra text, display on the top right

slots.name: title
slots.description: custom title, display on the top left

slots.name: extra
slots.description: custom extra area, display on the top right

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: column width, the width of the same column in different rows is set by the max value

attributes.name: min-width
attributes.description: column minimum width, columns with `width` has a fixed width, while columns with `min-width` has a width that is distributed in proportion

attributes.name: label-align
attributes.description: column label alignment, if omitted, the value of the above `align` attribute will be applied

tags.name: el-dialog
tags.description: Informs users while preserving the current page state.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: title of Dialog. Can also be passed with a named slot (see the following table)

attributes.name: fullscreen
attributes.description: whether the Dialog takes up full screen

attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append Dialog itself to body. A nested Dialog should have this attribute set to `true`

attributes.name: lock-scroll
attributes.description: whether scroll of body is disabled while Dialog is displayed

attributes.name: close-on-click-modal
attributes.description: whether the Dialog can be closed by clicking the mask

attributes.name: close-on-press-escape
attributes.description: whether the Dialog can be closed by pressing ESC

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.description: whether to show a close button

attributes.name: before-close
attributes.description: callback before Dialog closes, and it will prevent Dialog from closing

value.type: function，done is used to close the dialog

attributes.name: center
attributes.description: whether to align the header and footer in center

attributes.name: destroy-on-close
attributes.description: Destroy elements in Dialog when closed

events.name: open
events.description: triggers when the Dialog opens

events.name: opened
events.description: triggers when the Dialog opening animation ends

events.name: close
events.description: triggers when the Dialog closes

events.name: closed
events.description: triggers when the Dialog closing animation ends

tags.name: el-divider
tags.description: The dividing line that separates the content.

attributes.name: content-position
attributes.description: customize the content on the divider line

tags.name: el-drawer
tags.description: Sometimes, `Dialog` does not always satisfy our requirements, let's say you have a massive form, or you need space to display something like `terms & conditions`, `Drawer` has almost identical API with `Dialog`, but it introduces different user experience.

attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.description: Controls should Drawer be inserted to DocumentBody Element, nested Drawer must assign this param to **true**

attributes.name: lock-scroll
attributes.description: whether scroll of body is disabled while Drawer is displayed

attributes.name: before-close
attributes.description: If set, closing procedure will be halted

attributes.name: close-on-click-modal
attributes.description: whether the Drawer can be closed by clicking the mask

attributes.name: close-on-press-escape
attributes.description: Indicates whether Drawer can be closed by pressing ESC

attributes.name: destroy-on-close
attributes.description: Indicates whether children should be destroyed after Drawer closed

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.description: Should show close button at the top right of Drawer

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Drawer's size, if Drawer is horizontal mode, it effects the width property, otherwise it effects the height property, when size is `number` type, it describes the size by unit of pixels; when size is `string` type, it should be used with `x%` notation, other wise it will be interpreted to pixel unit

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Drawer's title, can also be set by named slot, detailed descriptions can be found in the slot form

attributes.name: with-header
attributes.description: Flag that controls the header section's existance, default to true, when withHeader set to false, both `title attribute` and `title slot` won't work

attributes.name: modal-class
attributes.description: Extra class names for shadowing layer

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered before Drawer opening animation begins

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered after Drawer opening animation ended

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered before Drawer closing animation begins

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered after Drawer closing animation ended

tags.name: el-dropdown
tags.description: Toggleable menu for displaying lists of links and actions.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: menu button type, refer to `Button` Component, only works when `split-button` is true

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: menu size, also works on the split button

attributes.name: split-button
attributes.description: whether a button group is displayed

attributes.name: hide-on-click
attributes.description: whether to hide menu after clicking menu-item

attributes.name: show-timeout
attributes.description: Delay time before show a dropdown (only works when trigger is `hover`)

attributes.name: hide-timeout
attributes.description: Delay time before hide a dropdown (only works when trigger is `hover`)

events.name: click
events.description: if `split-button` is `true`, triggers when left button is clicked

events.name: command
events.description: triggers when a dropdown item is clicked

events.name: visible-change
events.description: triggers when the dropdown appears/disappears

slots.name: default
slots.description: content of Dropdown. Notice: Must be a valid html dom element (ex. `<span>, <button> etc.`) or `el-component`, to attach the trigger listener

slots.name: dropdown
slots.description: content of the Dropdown Menu, usually a `<el-dropdown-menu>` element

attributes.name: command
attributes.description: a command to be dispatched to Dropdown's `command` callback

tags.name: el-empty
tags.description: Placeholder hints for empty states.

tags.name: el-form
tags.description: Form consists of `input`, `radio`, `select`, `checkbox` and so on. With form, you can collect, verify and submit data.

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: position of label. If set to 'left' or 'right', `label-width` prop is also required

attributes.name: label-width
attributes.description: width of label, e.g. '50px'. All its direct child form items will inherit this value. Width `auto` is supported.

attributes.name: hide-required-asterisk
attributes.description: whether required fields should have a red asterisk (star) beside their labels

attributes.name: show-message
attributes.description: whether to show the error message

attributes.name: inline-message
attributes.description: whether to display the error message inline with the form item

attributes.name: status-icon
attributes.description: whether to display an icon indicating the validation result

attributes.name: validate-on-rule-change
attributes.description: whether to trigger validation when the `rules` prop is changed

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: control the size of components in this form

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: whether to disabled all components in this form. If set to true, it cannot be overridden by its inner components' `disabled` prop

events.name: validate
events.description: triggers after a form item is validated

attributes.name: prop
attributes.description: a key of `model`. In the use of validate and resetFields method, the attribute is required

attributes.name: label-width
attributes.description: width of label, e.g. '50px'. Width `auto` is supported.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: whether the field is required or not, will be determined by validation rules if omitted

attributes.name: rules
attributes.description: validation rules of form, see the following table, more advanced usage at [async-validator](https://github.com/yiminghe/async-validator)

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: field error message, set its value and the field will validate error and show this message immediately

attributes.name: show-message
attributes.description: whether to show the error message

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: control the size of components in this form-item

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: SVG icon size, size x size

tags.name: el-image
tags.description: Besides the native features of img, support lazy load, custom placeholder and load failure, etc.

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: Indicate how the image should be resized to fit its container, same as [object-fit](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/object-fit)

attributes.name: hide-on-click-modal
attributes.description: When enabling preview, use this flag to control whether clicking on backdrop can exit preview mode

attributes.name: scroll-container
attributes.description: The container to add scroll listener when using lazy load
attributes.default: The nearest parent container whose overflow property is auto or scroll

events.name: load
events.description: Same as native load

events.name: error
events.description: Same as native error

attributes.name: initial-index
attributes.description: The initial preview image index, less than or equal to the length of `url-list`

attributes.name: hide-on-click-modal
attributes.description: Whether user can emit close event when clicking backdrop

attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append image itself to body. A nested parent element attribute transform should have this attribute set to `true`

tags.name: el-input-number
tags.description: Input numerical values with a customizable range.

attributes.name: step-strictly
attributes.description: whether input value can only be multiple of step

attributes.name: controls
attributes.description: whether to enable the control buttons

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the value changes

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

tags.name: el-input
tags.description: Input data using mouse or keyboard.

attributes.name: show-word-limit
attributes.description: whether show word count，only works when `type` is 'text' or 'textarea'

attributes.name: show-password
attributes.description: whether to show toggleable password input

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: size of Input, works when `type` is not 'textarea'

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: number of rows of textarea, only works when `type` is 'textarea'

attributes.name: autosize
attributes.description: whether textarea has an adaptive height, only works when `type` is 'textarea'. Can accept an object, e.g. { minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }

attributes.name: input-style
attributes.description: the style of the input element or textarea element

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

events.name: change
events.description: triggers only when the input box loses focus or the user presses Enter

events.name: input
events.description: triggers when the Input value change

events.name: clear
events.description: triggers when the Input is cleared by clicking the clear button

attributes.name: value-key
attributes.description: key name of the input suggestion object for display

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: debounce delay when typing, in milliseconds

attributes.name: fetch-suggestions
attributes.description: a method to fetch input suggestions. When suggestions are ready, invoke `callback(data:[])` to return them to Autocomplete

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for autocomplete's dropdown

attributes.name: trigger-on-focus
attributes.description: whether show suggestions when input focus

attributes.name: select-when-unmatched
attributes.description: whether to emit a `select` event on enter when there is no autocomplete match

attributes.name: hide-loading
attributes.description: whether to hide the loading icon in remote search

attributes.name: popper-append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append the dropdown to body. If the positioning of the dropdown is wrong, you can try to set this prop to false

attributes.name: highlight-first-item
attributes.description: whether to highlight first item in remote search suggestions by default

events.name: select
events.description: triggers when a suggestion is clicked

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the icon inside Input value change

attributes.name: span
attributes.description: number of column the grid spans

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: number of spacing on the left side of the grid

attributes.name: push
attributes.description: number of columns that grid moves to the right

attributes.name: pull
attributes.description: number of columns that grid moves to the left

attributes.name: xs
attributes.description: `<768px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: sm
attributes.description: `≥768px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: md
attributes.description: `≥992px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: lg
attributes.description: `≥1200px` Responsive columns or column props object

attributes.name: xl
attributes.description: `≥1920px` Responsive columns or column props object

tags.name: el-link
tags.description: Text hyperlink

attributes.name: collapse
attributes.description: whether the menu is collapsed (available only in vertical mode)

attributes.name: active-text-color
attributes.description: text color of currently active menu item (hex format)

attributes.name: default-openeds
attributes.description: array that contains indexes of currently active sub-menus

attributes.name: unique-opened
attributes.description: whether only one sub-menu can be active

attributes.name: menu-trigger
attributes.description: how sub-menus are triggered, only works when `mode` is 'horizontal'

attributes.name: router
attributes.description: whether `vue-router` mode is activated. If true, index will be used as 'path' to activate the route action

attributes.name: collapse-transition
attributes.description: whether to enable the collapse transition

events.name: select
events.description: callback function when menu is activated

events.name: open
events.description: callback function when sub-menu expands

events.name: close
events.description: callback function when sub-menu collapses

events.name: click
events.description: callback function when menu-item is clicked

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for the popup menu

attributes.name: popper-append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append the popup menu to body. If the positioning of the menu is wrong, you can try setting this prop
attributes.default: level one Submenu: true / other Submenus: false

tags.name: el-page-header
tags.description: If path of the page is simple, it is recommended to use PageHeader instead of the Breadcrumb.

events.name: back
events.description: triggers when right side is clicked

tags.name: el-pagination
tags.description: If you have too much data to display in one page, use pagination.

attributes.name: background
attributes.description: whether the buttons have a background color

attributes.name: page-size
attributes.description: item count of each page, supports the v-model bidirectional binding

attributes.name: default-page-size
attributes.description: default initial value of page size

attributes.name: page-count
attributes.description: total page count. Set either `total` or `page-count` and pages will be displayed; if you need `page-sizes`, `total` is required

attributes.name: pager-count
attributes.description: number of pagers. Pagination collapses when the total page count exceeds this value

attributes.name: current-page
attributes.description: current page number, supports the v-model bidirectional binding

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: layout of Pagination, elements separated with a comma

attributes.name: page-sizes
attributes.description: options of item count per page

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for the page size Select's dropdown

attributes.name: hide-on-single-page
attributes.description: whether to hide when there's only one page

events.name: size-change
events.description: triggers when `page-size` changes

events.name: current-change
events.description: triggers when `current-page` changes

events.name: prev-click
events.description: triggers when the prev button is clicked and current page changes

events.name: next-click
events.description: triggers when the next button is clicked and current page changes

slots.name: default
slots.description: custom content. To use this, you need to declare `slot` in `layout`

tags.name: el-popconfirm
tags.description: A simple confirmation dialog of an element click action.

events.name: confirm
events.description: triggers when click confirm button

events.name: cancel
events.description: triggers when click cancel button

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: popover content, can be replaced with a default `slot`

attributes.name: show-arrow
attributes.description: whether a tooltip arrow is displayed or not. For more info, please refer to [Vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)

attributes.name: auto-close
attributes.description: timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip

events.name: show
events.description: triggers when popover shows

events.name: after-enter
events.description: triggers when the entering transition ends

events.name: hide
events.description: triggers when popover hides

events.name: after-leave
events.description: triggers when the leaving transition ends

tags.name: el-progress
tags.description: Progress is used to show the progress of current operation, and inform the user the current status.

attributes.name: text-inside
attributes.description: whether to place the percentage inside progress bar, only works when `type` is 'line'

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: the current status of progress bar

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: control the animation duration of indeterminate progress

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: background color of progress bar. Overrides `status` prop

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: the canvas width of circle progress bar

attributes.name: stroke-linecap
attributes.description: circle/dashboard type shape at the end path

tags.name: el-radio
tags.description: Single selection among multiple options.

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: whether to add a border around Radio

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: size of the Radio, only works when `border` is true

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the bound value changes

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: the size of radio buttons or bordered radios

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: whether the nesting radios are disabled

attributes.name: text-color
attributes.description: font color when button is active

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: border and background color when button is active

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the bound value changes

tags.name: el-rate
tags.description: Used for rating

attributes.name: allow-half
attributes.description: whether picking half start is allowed

attributes.name: low-threshold
attributes.description: threshold value between low and medium level. The value itself will be included in low level

attributes.name: high-threshold
attributes.description: threshold value between medium and high level. The value itself will be included in high level

attributes.name: colors
attributes.description: colors for icons. If array, it should have 3 elements, each of which corresponds with a score level, else if object, the key should be threshold value between two levels, and the value should be corresponding color

attributes.name: icon-classes
attributes.description: class names of icons. If array, ot should have 3 elements, each of which corresponds with a score level, else if object, the key should be threshold value between two levels, and the value should be corresponding icon class

attributes.name: disabled-void-icon-class
attributes.description: class name of unselected read-only icons

attributes.name: show-score
attributes.description: whether to display current score. show-score and show-text cannot be true at the same time

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when rate value is changed

tags.name: el-result
tags.description: Used to give feedback on the result of user's operation or access exception.

tags.name: el-scrollbar
tags.description: Used to replace the browser's native scrollbar.

attributes.name: native
attributes.description: whether to use the native scrollbar style

attributes.name: noresize
attributes.description: do not respond to container size changes, if the container size does not change, it is better to set it to optimize performance

events.name: scroll
events.description: triggers when scrolling

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the selected value changes

events.name: visible-change
events.description: triggers when the dropdown appears/disappears

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: triggers when a tag is removed in multiple mode

events.name: clear
events.description: triggers when the clear icon is clicked in a clearable Select

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

tags.name: el-select
tags.description: When there are plenty of options, use a drop-down menu to display and select desired ones.

attributes.name: value-key
attributes.description: unique identity key name for value, required when value is an object

attributes.name: collapse-tags
attributes.description: whether to collapse tags to a text when multiple selecting

attributes.name: multiple-limit
attributes.description: maximum number of options user can select when `multiple` is `true`. No limit when set to 0

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the name attribute of select input

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: the autocomplete attribute of select input

attributes.name: allow-create
attributes.description: whether creating new items is allowed. To use this, `filterable` must be true

attributes.name: remote
attributes.description: whether options are loaded from server

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: whether Select is loading data from server

attributes.name: loading-text
attributes.description: displayed text while loading data from server

attributes.name: no-match-text
attributes.description: displayed text when no data matches the filtering query, you can also use slot `empty`

attributes.name: no-data-text
attributes.description: displayed text when there is no options, you can also use slot `empty`

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for Select's dropdown

attributes.name: reserve-keyword
attributes.description: when `multiple` and `filter` is true, whether to reserve current keyword after selecting an option

attributes.name: default-first-option
attributes.description: select first matching option on enter key. Use with `filterable` or `remote`

attributes.name: popper-append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append the popper menu to body. If the positioning of the popper is wrong, you can try to set this prop to false

attributes.name: automatic-dropdown
attributes.description: for non-filterable Select, this prop decides if the option menu pops up when the input is focused

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the selected value changes

events.name: visible-change
events.description: triggers when the dropdown appears/disappears

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: triggers when a tag is removed in multiple mode

events.name: clear
events.description: triggers when the clear icon is clicked in a clearable Select

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

slots.name: empty
slots.description: content when there is no options

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: whether to disable all options in this group

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: label of option, same as `value` if omitted

tags.name: el-skeleton
tags.description: When loading data, and you need a rich experience for visual and interactions for your end users, you can choose `skeleton`.

attributes.name: count
attributes.description: how many fake items to render to the DOM

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: numbers of the row, only useful when no template slot were given

tags.name: el-slider
tags.description: Drag the slider within a fixed range.

attributes.name: show-input
attributes.description: whether to display an input box, works when `range` is false

attributes.name: show-input-controls
attributes.description: whether to display control buttons when `show-input` is true

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Slider height, required in vertical mode

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: debounce delay when typing, in milliseconds, works when `show-input` is true

attributes.name: tooltip-class
attributes.description: custom class name for the tooltip

attributes.name: marks
attributes.description: marks， type of key must be `number` and must in closed interval `[min, max]`, each mark can custom style

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when the value changes (if the mouse is being dragged, this event only fires when the mouse is released)

events.name: input
events.description: triggers when the data changes (It'll be emitted in real time during sliding)

tags.name: el-space
tags.description: Even though we have [Divider]

tags.name: el-steps
tags.description: Guide the user to complete tasks in accordance with the process. Its steps can be set according to the actual application scenario and the number of the steps can't be less than 2.

attributes.name: space
attributes.description: the spacing of each step, will be responsive if omitted. Supports percentage.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: step icon's class name. Icons can be passed via named slot as well

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: current status. It will be automatically set by Steps if not configured.

tags.name: el-switch
tags.description: Switch is used for switching between two opposing states.

attributes.name: model-value
attributes.description: binding value, it should be equivalent to either `active-value` or `inactive-value`, by default it's `boolean` type

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: whether Switch is in loading state

attributes.name: active-icon-class
attributes.description: class name of the icon displayed when in `on` state, overrides `active-text`

attributes.name: inactive-icon-class
attributes.description: class name of the icon displayed when in `off` state, overrides `inactive-text`

attributes.name: before-change
attributes.description: before-change hook before the switch state changes. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, will stop switching

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when value changes

tags.name: el-table
tags.description: Display multiple data with similar format. You can sort, filter, compare your data in a table.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Table's height. By default it has an `auto` height. If its value is a number, the height is measured in pixels; if its value is a string, the value will be assigned to element's style.height, the height is affected by external styles

attributes.name: max-height
attributes.description: Table's max-height. The legal value is a number or the height in px.

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: whether width of column automatically fits its container

attributes.name: current-row-key
attributes.description: key of current row, a set only prop

attributes.name: row-class-name
attributes.description: function that returns custom class names for a row, or a string assigning class names for every row

attributes.name: row-style
attributes.description: function that returns custom style for a row, or an object assigning custom style for every row

attributes.name: cell-class-name
attributes.description: function that returns custom class names for a cell, or a string assigning class names for every cell

attributes.name: cell-style
attributes.description: function that returns custom style for a cell, or an object assigning custom style for every cell

attributes.name: header-row-class-name
attributes.description: function that returns custom class names for a row in table header, or a string assigning class names for every row in table header

attributes.name: header-row-style
attributes.description: function that returns custom style for a row in table header, or an object assigning custom style for every row in table header

attributes.name: header-cell-class-name
attributes.description: function that returns custom class names for a cell in table header, or a string assigning class names for every cell in table header

attributes.name: header-cell-style
attributes.description: function that returns custom style for a cell in table header, or an object assigning custom style for every cell in table header

attributes.name: row-key
attributes.description: key of row data, used for optimizing rendering. Required if `reserve-selection` is on or display tree data. When its type is String, multi-level access is supported, e.g. `user.info.id`, but `user.info[0].id` is not supported, in which case `Function` should be used.

attributes.name: empty-text
attributes.description: Displayed text when data is empty. You can customize this area with `#empty`

attributes.name: default-expand-all
attributes.description: whether expand all rows by default, works when the table has a column type="expand" or contains tree structure data

attributes.name: expand-row-keys
attributes.description: set expanded rows by this prop, prop's value is the keys of expand rows, you should set row-key before using this prop

attributes.name: default-sort
attributes.description: set the default sort column and order. property `prop` is used to set default sort column, property `order` is used to set default sort order
attributes.default: if `prop` is set, and `order` is not set, then `order` is default to ascending

attributes.name: show-summary
attributes.description: whether to display a summary row

attributes.name: sum-text
attributes.description: displayed text for the first column of summary row

attributes.name: span-method
attributes.description: method that returns rowspan and colspan

attributes.name: select-on-indeterminate
attributes.description: controls the behavior of master checkbox in multi-select tables when only some rows are selected (but not all). If true, all rows will be selected, else deselected.

attributes.name: load
attributes.description: method for loading child row data, only works when `lazy` is true

events.name: select
events.description: triggers when user clicks the checkbox in a row

events.name: select-all
events.description: triggers when user clicks the checkbox in table header

events.name: selection-change
events.description: triggers when selection changes

events.name: cell-mouse-enter
events.description: triggers when hovering into a cell

events.name: cell-mouse-leave
events.description: triggers when hovering out of a cell

events.name: cell-click
events.description: triggers when clicking a cell

events.name: cell-dblclick
events.description: triggers when double clicking a cell

events.name: cell-contextmenu
events.description: triggers when user right clicks on a cell

events.name: row-click
events.description: triggers when clicking a row

events.name: row-contextmenu
events.description: triggers when user right clicks on a row

events.name: row-dblclick
events.description: triggers when double clicking a row

events.name: header-click
events.description: triggers when clicking a column header

events.name: header-contextmenu
events.description: triggers when user right clicks on a column header

events.name: sort-change
events.description: triggers when Table's sorting changes

events.name: filter-change
events.description: column's key. If you need to use the filter-change event, this attribute is mandatory to identify which column is being filtered

events.name: current-change
events.description: triggers when current row changes

events.name: header-dragend
events.description: triggers after changing a column's width by dragging the column header's border

events.name: expand-change
events.description: triggers when user expands or collapses a row (for expandable table, second param is expandedRows; for tree Table, second param is expanded)

slots.name: append
slots.description: Contents to be inserted after the last row. You may need this slot if you want to implement infinite scroll for the table. This slot will be displayed above the summary row if there is one.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: type of the column. If set to `selection`, the column will display checkbox. If set to `index`, the column will display index of the row (staring from 1). If set to `expand`, the column will display expand icon.

attributes.name: index
attributes.description: customize indices for each row, works on columns with `type=index`

attributes.name: column-key
attributes.description: column's key. If you need to use the filter-change event, you need this attribute to identify which column is being filtered

attributes.name: prop
attributes.description: field name. You can also use its alias: `property`

attributes.name: min-width
attributes.description: column minimum width. Columns with `width` has a fixed width, while columns with `min-width` has a width that is distributed in proportion

attributes.name: fixed
attributes.description: whether column is fixed at left / right. Will be fixed at left if `true`

attributes.name: render-header
attributes.description: render function for table header of this column

attributes.name: sortable
attributes.description: whether column can be sorted. Remote sorting can be done by setting this attribute to 'custom' and listening to the `sort-change` event of Table

attributes.name: sort-method
attributes.description: sorting method, works when `sortable` is `true`. Should return a number, just like Array.sort

attributes.name: sort-by
attributes.description: specify which property to sort by, works when `sortable` is `true` and `sort-method` is `undefined`. If set to an Array, the column will sequentially sort by the next property if the previous one is equal

attributes.name: sort-orders
attributes.description: the order of the sorting strategies used when sorting the data, works when `sortable` is `true`. Accepts an array, as the user clicks on the header, the column is sorted in order of the elements in the array

attributes.name: resizable
attributes.description: whether column width can be resized, works when `border` of `el-table` is `true`

attributes.name: show-overflow-tooltip
attributes.description: whether to hide extra content and show them in a tooltip when hovering on the cell

attributes.name: header-align
attributes.description: alignment of the table header. If omitted, the value of the above `align` attribute will be applied

attributes.name: class-name
attributes.description: class name of cells in the column

attributes.name: label-class-name
attributes.description: class name of the label of this column

attributes.name: selectable
attributes.description: function that determines if a certain row can be selected, works when `type` is 'selection'

attributes.name: reserve-selection
attributes.description: whether to reserve selection after data refreshing, works when `type` is 'selection'. Note that `row-key` is required for this to work

attributes.name: filters
attributes.description: an array of data filtering options. For each element in this array, `text` and `value` are required

attributes.name: filter-multiple
attributes.description: whether data filtering supports multiple options

attributes.name: filter-method
attributes.description: data filtering method. If `filter-multiple` is on, this method will be called multiple times for each row, and a row will display if one of the calls returns `true`

attributes.name: filtered-value
attributes.description: filter value for selected data, might be useful when table header is rendered with `render-header`

slots.name: default
slots.description: Custom content for table columns. The scope parameter is { row, column, $index }

slots.name: header
slots.description: Custom content for table header. The scope parameter is { column, $index }

tags.name: el-tabs
tags.description: Divide data collections which are related yet belong to different types.

attributes.name: model-value
attributes.description: binding value, name of the selected tab

attributes.name: editable
attributes.description: whether Tab is addable and closable

attributes.name: stretch
attributes.description: whether width of tab automatically fits its container

attributes.name: before-leave
attributes.description: hook function before switching tab. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, switching will be prevented

events.name: tab-click
events.description: triggers when a tab is clicked

events.name: tab-remove
events.description: triggers when tab-remove button is clicked

events.name: tab-add
events.description: triggers when tab-add button is clicked

events.name: edit
events.description: triggers when tab-add button or tab-remove is clicked

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: identifier corresponding to the name of Tabs, representing the alias of the tab-pane
attributes.default: ordinal number of the tab-pane in the sequence, e.g. the first tab-pane is '1'

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when Check Tag is clicked

tags.name: el-tag
tags.description: Used for marking and selection.

attributes.name: hit
attributes.description: whether Tag has a highlighted border

events.name: click
events.description: triggers when Tag is clicked

events.name: close
events.description: triggers when Tag is removed

tags.name: el-time-picker
tags.description: Use Time Picker for time input.

attributes.name: start-placeholder
attributes.description: placeholder for the start time in range mode

attributes.name: end-placeholder
attributes.description: placeholder for the end time in range mode

attributes.name: is-range
attributes.description: whether to pick a time range

attributes.name: arrow-control
attributes.description: whether to pick time using arrow buttons

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for TimePicker's dropdown

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: format of the displayed value in the input box

attributes.name: default-value
attributes.description: optional, default date of the calendar

attributes.name: disabled-hours
attributes.description: To specify the array of hours that cannot be selected

attributes.name: disabled-minutes
attributes.description: To specify the array of minutes that cannot be selected

attributes.name: disabled-seconds
attributes.description: To specify the array of seconds that cannot be selected

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when user confirms the value

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

tags.name: el-time-select
tags.description: Use Time Select for time input.

attributes.name: min-time
attributes.description: minimum time, any time before this time will be disabled

attributes.name: max-time
attributes.description: maximum time, any time after this time will be disabled

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when user confirms the value

events.name: blur
events.description: triggers when Input blurs

events.name: focus
events.description: triggers when Input focuses

tags.name: el-timeline
tags.description: Visually display timeline.

tags.name: el-tooltip
tags.description: Display prompt information for mouse hover.

attributes.name: append-to-body
attributes.description: whether to append Dialog itself to body. A nested Dialog should have this attribute set to `true`

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: display content, can be overridden by `slot#content`

attributes.name: visible-arrow
attributes.description: whether an arrow is displayed. For more information, check [Vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper) page

attributes.name: auto-close
attributes.description: timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip

attributes.name: manual
attributes.description: whether to control Tooltip manually. `mouseenter` and `mouseleave` won't have effects if set to `true`

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.description: custom class name for Tooltip's popper

attributes.name: enterable
attributes.description: whether the mouse can enter the tooltip

attributes.name: target-order
attributes.description: order strategy for elements in the target list. If set to `original`, the elements will keep the same order as the data source. If set to `push`, the newly added elements will be pushed to the bottom. If set to `unshift`, the newly added elements will be inserted on the top

attributes.name: render-content
attributes.description: custom render function for data items

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: texts for checking status in list header

attributes.name: left-default-checked
attributes.description: key array of initially checked data items of the left list

attributes.name: right-default-checked
attributes.description: key array of initially checked data items of the right list

events.name: change
events.description: triggers when data items change in the right list

events.name: left-check-change
events.description: triggers when end user changes the checked state of any data item in the left list

events.name: right-check-change
events.description: triggers when end user changes the checked state of any data item in the right list

tags.name: el-tree
tags.description: Display a set of data with hierarchies.

attributes.name: empty-text
attributes.description: text displayed when data is void

attributes.name: node-key
attributes.description: unique identity key name for nodes, its value should be unique across the whole tree

attributes.name: props
attributes.description: configuration options, see the following table

attributes.name: render-after-expand
attributes.description: whether to render child nodes only after a parent node is expanded for the first time

attributes.name: load
attributes.description: method for loading subtree data, only works when `lazy` is true

attributes.name: default-expand-all
attributes.description: whether to expand all nodes by default

attributes.name: expand-on-click-node
attributes.description: whether to expand or collapse node when clicking on the node, if false, then expand or collapse node only when clicking on the arrow icon.

attributes.name: check-on-click-node
attributes.description: whether to check or uncheck node when clicking on the node, if false, the node can only be checked or unchecked by clicking on the checkbox.

attributes.name: auto-expand-parent
attributes.description: whether to expand father node when a child node is expanded

attributes.name: default-expanded-keys
attributes.description: array of keys of initially expanded nodes

attributes.name: check-strictly
attributes.description: whether checked state of a node not affects its father and child nodes when `show-checkbox` is `true`

attributes.name: default-checked-keys
attributes.description: array of keys of initially checked nodes

attributes.name: filter-node-method
attributes.description: this function will be executed on each node when use filter method. if return `false`, tree node will be hidden.

attributes.name: accordion
attributes.description: whether only one node among the same level can be expanded at one time

attributes.name: indent
attributes.description: horizontal indentation of nodes in adjacent levels in pixels

attributes.name: lazy
attributes.description: whether to lazy load leaf node, used with `load` attribute

attributes.name: draggable
attributes.description: whether enable tree nodes drag and drop

attributes.name: allow-drag
attributes.description: this function will be executed before dragging a node. If `false` is returned, the node can not be dragged

attributes.name: allow-drop
attributes.description: this function will be executed before the dragging node is dropped. If `false` is returned, the dragging node can not be dropped at the target node. `type` has three possible values: 'prev' (inserting the dragging node before the target node), 'inner' (inserting the dragging node to the target node) and 'next' (inserting the dragging node after the target node)

events.name: node-click
events.description: triggers when a node is clicked

events.name: node-contextmenu
events.description: triggers when a node is clicked by right button

events.name: check-change
events.description: triggers when the selected state of the node changes

events.name: check
events.description: triggers after clicking the checkbox of a node

events.name: current-change
events.description: triggers when current node changes

events.name: node-expand
events.description: triggers when current node open

events.name: node-collapse
events.description: triggers when current node close

events.name: node-drag-start
events.description: triggers when dragging starts

events.name: node-drag-enter
events.description: triggers when the dragging node enters another node

events.name: node-drag-leave
events.description: triggers when the dragging node leaves a node

events.name: node-drag-over
events.description: triggers when dragging over a node (like mouseover event)

events.name: node-drag-end
events.description: triggers when dragging ends

events.name: node-drop
events.description: triggers after the dragging node is dropped

slots.name: default
slots.description: Custom content for tree nodes. The scope parameter is { node, data }

tags.name: el-upload
tags.description: Upload files by clicking or drag-and-drop

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: whether uploading multiple files is permitted

attributes.name: show-file-list
attributes.description: whether to show the uploaded file list

attributes.name: drag
attributes.description: whether to activate drag and drop mode

attributes.name: accept
attributes.description: accepted [file types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept), will not work when `thumbnail-mode` is `true`

attributes.name: on-preview
attributes.description: hook function when clicking the uploaded files

attributes.name: on-remove
attributes.description: hook function when files are removed

attributes.name: on-error
attributes.description: hook function when some errors occurs

attributes.name: on-progress
attributes.description: hook function when some progress occurs

attributes.name: on-change
attributes.description: hook function when select file or upload file success or upload file fail

attributes.name: before-upload
attributes.description: hook function before uploading with the file to be uploaded as its parameter. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, uploading will be aborted

attributes.name: before-remove
attributes.description: hook function before removing a file with the file and file list as its parameters. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, removing will be aborted.

attributes.name: http-request
attributes.description: override default xhr behavior, allowing you to implement your own upload-file's request

attributes.name: on-exceed
attributes.description: hook function when limit is exceeded

attributes.name: v-infinite-scroll
attributes.description: Load more data while reach bottom of the page

attributes.name: infinite-scroll-immediate
attributes.description: Whether to execute the loading method immediately, in case the content cannot be filled up in the initial state.

attributes.name: element-loading-text
attributes.description: loading text that displays under the spinner

attributes.name: element-loading-spinner
attributes.description: class name of the custom spinner
